description: A simple recipe. An instant hit with the kids
name: 3 Ingredient Strawberry Mousse Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Mix half of the jelly powder as per packet instructions and allow to set in individual decorative bowls in the fridge.

Once the jelly is roughly 50-60% set, in another bowl mix the remaining half of the jelly powder as per packet instructions and fold in the thickened cream as well as half of the chopped strawberries.
Layer this mix over the setting jelly in the individual bowls and allow to set completely in the fridge.
Decorate with chopped strawberries and blueberries once completely set and serve.
